title: Time-Compressed Animation-Based Project Learning for Understanding Reproductive Physiology

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary biology and human anatomy understanding
context.additional_context: Application of TCAD (Text and Computer-Aided Design) methodology combining 3D animation with text materials in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain the process of germ cell formation through TCAD with over 80% precision
Learners can produce PBL artifacts demonstrating interactions between human reproductive organs based on animation analysis results
Learners can achieve over 75 points (intermediate difficulty) on knowledge assessments post-training
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
